name: WKInterfaceImage
desc: An image that can be displayed in the interface of your watchOS app.

items.name: func setImage(UIImage?)
items.desc: Sets the displayed image using the specified image object.

items.name: func setImageData(Data?)
items.desc: Sets the displayed image using a formatted data object.

items.name: func setImageNamed(String?)
items.desc: Sets the displayed image using a named image resource file.

items.name: func setTintColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Changes the color applied to a template image.
